abstract: John Reilly and Friends, folk music group formed by actor John C Reilly, is set to perform in Lincoln Center's American Songbook series as part of two-week tour; Reilly says he organized band to highlight work of his singer-songwriter collaborators Tom Brosseau and Becky Stark and to protect types of America music that are at risk of being forgotten.
lead_paragraph: John Reilly and Friends, a folk group led by the actor John C. Reilly that will perform in Lincoln Center’s Songbook series, was born of his abiding connection to American roots music.
snippet: John Reilly and Friends, a folk group led by the actor John C. Reilly that will perform in Lincoln Center’s Songbook series, was born of his abiding connection to American roots music.

headline.main: A Film Star Finds His Folk Groove
headline.seo: John C. Reilly’s Group in Lincoln Center Songbook Series
headline.print_headline: A Film Star Finds His Folk Groove
